alert.note: Alert for Brown; Calumet; Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Outagamie; Portage; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Scattered showers and thunderstorms were producing locally heavy rain this evening... At 954 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and thunderstorms from Florence to Antigo to Clintonvillle, then to Wausau to Stevens Point and Wisconsin Rapids. The showers and thunderstorms were moving to the east at 30 mph. These showers and storms have a history of producing over an inch of rain in less than an hour at some locations. HAZARD...Winds to 30 mph. Torrential rainfall is possible which may lead to localized flooding and ponding of water on area roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. The scattered showers and thunderstorms will be near Plainfield around 1025 PM CDT. Green Bay around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by the showers and storms include Florence, Antigo, Clintonville, Wausau, Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Freedom, Bavaria, Aurora, Whitcomb, Powers Bluff County Park, Commonwealth, Allenville and Frazer Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
